title: Olink Mapping
text: dataset provides mapping Olink Explore Target proteins corresponding genomic coordinates gene identifiers. data derived Olink assay data mapped using BioMart.

title: Olink Mapping
text: mapping generated using following steps: Input Data: Raw data sourced Olink Explore Target assay files (CSV Excel formats). Formatting: UniProt IDs Target Gene symbols extracted separated multiple entries existed. Mapping: UniProt IDs HGNC symbols mapped Ensembl Gene IDs using biomaRt (Ensembl dataset hsapiens_gene_ensembl). protein_coding genes retained. standard chromosomes (1-22, X, Y) retained. Mappings filtered ensure consistency UniProt gene symbols Entrez/HGNC/External gene names. Genomic Positions: Start End positions retrieved hg19 hg38 builds using TxDb.Hsapiens.UCSC.hg19.knownGene TxDb.Hsapiens.UCSC.hg38.knownGene.

title: SomaLogic Mapping
text: dataset provides mapping SomaLogic aptamers corresponding genomic coordinates gene identifiers. data derived SomaLogic v5.0 Plasma ADAT file.

title: SomaLogic Mapping
text: mapping generated using following steps: Input Data: Raw data retrieved SomaLogic GitHub repository (Example Data v5.0 Plasma ADAT). Split multiple entries UniProt, Entrez Gene ID, Entrez Gene Symbol. Filtered Human organism . Filtered Protein type (removing controls). Excluded entries flagged “internal use ”. Mapping: UniProt IDs, Entrez IDs, HGNC symbols mapped Ensembl Gene IDs using biomaRt (Ensembl dataset hsapiens_gene_ensembl). protein_coding genes retained. standard chromosomes (1-22, X, Y) retained. Mappings cross-referenced ensure symbol consistency. Genomic Positions: Start End positions retrieved hg19 hg38 builds using TxDb.Hsapiens.UCSC.hg19.knownGene TxDb.Hsapiens.UCSC.hg38.knownGene.

title: Authors and Citation
text: Doe J (2026). usefuldata: Useful Data Sets. R package version 0.1.0, https://mattlee821.github.io/usefuldata.
code: @Manual{,   title = {usefuldata: Useful Data Sets},   author = {Jane Doe},   year = {2026},   note = {R package version 0.1.0},   url = {https://mattlee821.github.io/usefuldata}, }

title: Useful Data Sets
text: usefuldata package provides useful datasets analysis. currently includes pre-processed mapping datasets Olink SomaLogic proteomics platforms, include datasets future.

title: Useful Data Sets
text: can install package GitHub using remotes package:

title: Useful Data Sets
text: dataset maps Olink proteins (UniProt IDs) gene identifiers genomic positions. Columns include: - UNIPROT: UniProt ID (Olink identifier) - Target: Gene Symbol - ensembl_gene_id: Ensembl Gene ID - hgnc_id / hgnc_symbol: HGNC info - START_hg19 / END_hg19: Genomic coordinates (hg19) - START_hg38 / END_hg38: Genomic coordinates (hg38)

title: Useful Data Sets
text: dataset maps SomaLogic aptamers (SeqId/SomaId) gene identifiers genomic positions. Columns include: - SeqId: Sequence ID - SomaId: SomaLogic ID - UNIPROT: UniProt ID - Target: Gene Symbol - ensembl_gene_id: Ensembl Gene ID - START_hg19 / END_hg19: Genomic coordinates (hg19) - START_hg38 / END_hg38: Genomic coordinates (hg38)

title: Useful Data Sets
text: can load datasets directly R session:
code: library(usefuldata)  # Load Olink mapping head(mapping_GRCh38_p14_olink)  # Load SomaLogic mapping head(mapping_GRCh38_p14_somalogic)

title: Olink Mapping Data — mapping_GRCh38_p14_olink
text: dataset containing mapping UniProt IDs Olink data Ensembl, HGNC identifiers, along genomic positions hg19 hg38 builds.

title: Olink Mapping Data — mapping_GRCh38_p14_olink
text: data frame following columns: UNIPROT UniProt ID Target Target gene symbol (HGNC) TargetFullName Full protein name uniprot_gn_id UniProt gene ID uniprot_gn_symbol UniProt gene symbol entrezgene_id Entrez gene ID entrezgene_accession Entrez accession hgnc_id HGNC ID hgnc_symbol HGNC symbol ensembl_gene_id Ensembl gene ID external_gene_name External gene name gene_biotype Gene biotype (e.g. protein_coding) CHR Chromosome name START_hg19 Start position hg19 END_hg19 End position hg19 strand_hg19 Strand hg19 START_hg38 Start position hg38 END_hg38 End position hg38 strand_hg38 Strand hg38

title: Olink Mapping Data — mapping_GRCh38_p14_olink
text: Generated using BioMart Olink data files.

title: SomaLogic Mapping Data — mapping_GRCh38_p14_somalogic
text: dataset containing mapping SomaLogic IDs Ensembl, UniProt, HGNC identifiers, along genomic positions hg19 hg38 builds.

title: SomaLogic Mapping Data — mapping_GRCh38_p14_somalogic
text: data frame following columns: SeqId Sequence ID SomaId SomaLogic ID UNIPROT UniProt ID Target Target gene symbol (HGNC) TargetFullName Full protein name EntrezGeneID Entrez gene ID EntrezGeneSymbol Entrez gene symbol uniprot_gn_id UniProt gene ID uniprot_gn_symbol UniProt gene symbol entrezgene_id Entrez gene ID (mapped) entrezgene_accession Entrez accession (mapped) hgnc_id HGNC ID hgnc_symbol HGNC symbol ensembl_gene_id Ensembl gene ID external_gene_name External gene name gene_biotype Gene biotype (e.g. protein_coding) CHR Chromosome name START_hg19 Start position hg19 END_hg19 End position hg19 strand_hg19 Strand hg19 START_hg38 Start position hg38 END_hg38 End position hg38 strand_hg38 Strand hg38

title: SomaLogic Mapping Data — mapping_GRCh38_p14_somalogic
text: Generated using BioMart SomaLogic ADAT file.
